title: Google Drive
description: Configuration schema for rclone Google Drive backend

scope.title: Scope
scope.description: Scope that rclone should use when requesting access from drive

root_folder_id.title: Root Folder ID
root_folder_id.description: ID of the root folder. Leave blank for the root

service_account_file.title: Service Account File
service_account_file.description: Path to Service Account Credentials JSON file

team_drive.title: Team Drive ID
team_drive.description: ID of the Shared Drive (Team Drive)

shared_with_me.title: Show Shared With Me
shared_with_me.description: Only show files that are shared with me

trashed_only.title: Show Trashed Files Only
trashed_only.description: Only show files that are in the trash
